value.name: Man shot, killed at Salt Lake City house party, police searching for suspect
value.description: A man was shot and killed at a Salt Lake City house party early Saturday morning. Salt Lake City Police Lt. Carlos Valencia told Gephardt Daily, emergency dispatchers received a call from a residence near 2493 E.

value.name: 3 wounded in shooting outside Salt Lake City concert venue
value.description: The shots were fired shortly after 10 p.m. from a car as the three left The Complex, Salt Lake City police Lt. Carlos Valencia said. He said two victims were friends in their early 20s.

value.name: US to ease lockdown after virus passes 'peak'
value.description: "The police come with a whip to send people running, but how do you say to a poor person 'Stay home' if you don't have enough to eat?" said Carlos Valencia, a 35-year-old teacher. burs-sms/it US ...
